verbs.description: WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump [V: appears] [ARG1: likely to win his travel ban case at the Supreme Court] . Chief Justice John Roberts and Justice Anthony Kennedy both signaled support for the travel policy in arguments Wednesday at the high court .

WASHINGTON — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] appears likely to [V: win] [ARG1: his travel ban case] [ARGM-LOC: at the Supreme Court] . Chief Justice John Roberts and Justice Anthony Kennedy both signaled support for the travel policy in arguments Wednesday at the high court .

WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump appears likely to win his travel ban case at the Supreme Court . [ARG0: Chief Justice John Roberts and Justice Anthony Kennedy both] [V: signaled] [ARG1: support for the travel policy] [ARGM-LOC: in arguments] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARGM-LOC: at the high court] .
